meanings.definition: The action or process of enrolling or registering in a college or university.
meanings.sent1: Her matriculation at the university was a big step towards her dream career.
meanings.sent2: The matriculation of new students happens at the beginning of each academic year.
meanings.sent3: During the matriculation process, she accidentally signed up for the wrong class!
meanings.sent4: His matriculation into the prestigious university marked the start of a new chapter in his life.
meanings.sent5: The matriculation paperwork was a mountain of forms to fill out.

meanings.definition: The formal process of becoming a member of a college or university, typically involving a ceremony.
meanings.sent1: The matriculation ceremony was a grand event with speeches and music.
meanings.sent2: Every student looks forward to the matriculation ceremony as a rite of passage.
meanings.sent3: The matriculation ceremony had a surprise guest appearance by a famous alumnus.
meanings.sent4: Her matriculation into the university felt like stepping into a whole new world.
meanings.sent5: The matriculation ceremony was a symbol of her hard work paying off.
